::Grimmler::

"And don't come back!" Grimmler yells after Headstrong and fires
several shots at the bot. He turns back to Cliffjumper, his eyes
widening as he sees Astroblast fire.

"Watch out!" he exclaims, firing several laser bolts at Astroblast.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> --- Astroblast / Switchblade ---
>
> Astroblast transforms into robot mode, and pulls out his gun. He
> observes the Terrorcons messing with some Maximals, he sees
> and hears Megatron going for the big fish, and smiles, deciding not
> to bother Megatron till he is in need. He debates quickly about
> firing on the Element (S) then realizes the futility of the matter.
He > decides on a closer, smaller, easier to destroy target,
Cliffjumper. > He owed the bot anyways. He fires his Ionic Displacer
rifle three > times at the smaller bot. "Haha, dance foolish
Autobot!" >
> ----------------------
>
> Switchblade sees Fireblade in aparent trouble, and curses. He
> sneaks over to the battling bot, and attaches an unarmed charge to
> his back, in an easy to reach spot. He quickly leaps back to avoid
> gettin noticed, besides by Fireblade who can see him anyway. He
> continues on, dropping a Spider, and using it as a third eye.
